turns.en: Hi! What kind of mobile plan are you looking for—more data, lower cost, or both?
turns.zh: 嗨！你想找哪種手機方案：更多流量、比較便宜，還是兩者都要？

turns.hint_en: I need a plan with enough data, but I also want to keep the price reasonable.
turns.hint_zh: 我需要流量夠用的方案，但也希望價格合理。

turns.en: About how much data do you use in a typical month?
turns.zh: 你一個月大概會用多少流量？

turns.hint_en: Usually around 20 to 30 GB, but sometimes more when I travel.
turns.hint_zh: 通常大概 20 到 30GB，但出國或出差時會用更多。

turns.en: Do you mostly use data for video, social media, maps, or work calls?
turns.zh: 你的流量主要用在影片、社群、地圖，還是工作通話？

turns.hint_en: Mostly videos and social media, and I also use maps when I’m outside.
turns.hint_zh: 主要是看影片和社群，外出也會用地圖。

turns.en: Do you have Wi‑Fi at home and at work?
turns.zh: 你家裡和公司都有 Wi‑Fi 嗎？

turns.hint_en: Yes, I have Wi‑Fi at home and at the office.
turns.hint_zh: 有，我家裡跟辦公室都有 Wi‑Fi。

turns.en: In that case, a mid‑to‑high data plan may be enough. Do you ever hotspot your laptop?
turns.zh: 這樣的話中高流量可能就夠了。你會用手機分享網路給筆電嗎？

turns.hint_en: Sometimes, especially when I’m in a café or on the train.
turns.hint_zh: 偶爾會，特別是在咖啡廳或搭車時。

turns.en: Got it. Do you prefer unlimited data, or a capped plan with a lower monthly fee?
turns.zh: 了解。你偏好不限量，還是有上限但月費比較低的方案？

turns.hint_en: A capped plan is fine as long as I won’t run out too easily.
turns.hint_zh: 有上限也可以，只要不要太容易用完。

turns.en: If you exceed the cap, speeds may slow down or you may pay extra. Which do you prefer?
turns.zh: 如果超出上限，可能會降速或加收費用。你比較能接受哪一種？

turns.hint_en: I’d rather have slower speed than surprise extra charges.
turns.hint_zh: 我寧願降速，也不要突然多收費。

turns.en: Great. We can choose a plan with a fair cap and throttling after that. Do you need international roaming?
turns.zh: 好，那我們選一個上限合理、超量後降速的方案。你需要國際漫遊嗎？

turns.hint_en: Yes, I travel overseas a few times a year.
turns.hint_zh: 需要，我一年會出國幾次。

turns.en: Do you want a roaming add‑on only when you travel, or an always‑on roaming plan?
turns.zh: 你想要出國時再加購漫遊包，還是長期開著的漫遊方案？

turns.hint_en: Only when I travel; I don’t want to pay for it every month.
turns.hint_zh: 只在出國時加購，我不想每月都付漫遊費。

turns.en: Perfect. We can set up a travel add‑on you can activate in the app. What’s your budget range per month?
turns.zh: 沒問題，我們可以設定你在 App 一鍵開通的旅遊加購包。你每月預算大概多少？

turns.hint_en: Around NT$600 to NT$900 would be ideal.
turns.hint_zh: 大概每月 NT$600～900 比較理想。

turns.en: Within that range, you can get a plan with about 30–50 GB plus throttling. Do you want 5G or is 4G enough?
turns.zh: 在這個預算內，你可以拿到 30～50GB 左右加上降速不限量。你要 5G 嗎？還是 4G 也夠？

turns.hint_en: 5G would be nice, but 4G is okay if it’s cheaper.
turns.hint_zh: 5G 有更好，但如果便宜一點 4G 也可以。

turns.en: We’ll compare both options. Are you bringing your own phone, or do you need a new device?
turns.zh: 那我幫你比對 5G/4G 兩種。你是自備手機，還是要搭配新機？

turns.en: Great—SIM‑only plans are usually cheaper. Do you need an eSIM or a physical SIM?
turns.zh: 好，自備機通常更划算。你要 eSIM 還是實體 SIM？

turns.en: No problem. I’ll check if your phone supports eSIM and set it up. Do you want to keep your current number?
turns.zh: 沒問題。我會確認你手機支援 eSIM 並協助設定。你要保留原本門號嗎？

turns.hint_en: Yes, I want to keep the same number.
turns.hint_zh: 要，我想保留同一個號碼。

turns.en: Then we’ll do a number port. It usually takes a short time to activate. When do you want the new plan to start?
turns.zh: 那我們做攜碼。通常很快就能完成開通。你想什麼時候開始新方案？

turns.hint_en: As soon as possible—today if we can.
turns.hint_zh: 越快越好，能今天就最好。

turns.en: Sure. I’ll need your ID and a quick verification. After that, we can activate the eSIM and test data.
turns.zh: 可以。我需要你的證件和簡單驗證，之後就能開通 eSIM 並測試上網。

turns.hint_en: Sounds good. What do you need from me right now?
turns.hint_zh: 好，我現在需要提供什麼？

turns.en: Please bring your ID and your current SIM info; I’ll set up the plan and show you how to manage data in the app.
turns.zh: 請帶身分證件和目前的門號/SIM 資訊；我會幫你辦好並教你在 App 裡管理流量。
